short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Read lyrics while listening to a song.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is very useful for foreign language learners. 
Learning languages through song lyrics is a great way to sharpen your ear and get some vocabulary and grammar under your belt. Best of all, it’s fun, and if you’ve ever studied a language, you know that fun is important in keeping the motivation going.
